Name: Breakfast Gimlet
Instructions: STIR marmalade with gin in base of shaker to dissolve marmalade. Add lemon juice and lime cordial, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Orange marmalade justifies the 'breakfast' prefix and adds complexity to this gimlet.
History: A mashup of the classic Gimlet and Salvatore Calabrese 's Breakfast Martini . Created by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
